: : Kup : :

Kup also responded to the screams, running into the CR room.

Kup: What in blazes is going on here?


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord:

Windlord heard the scream and he ran towards the Cr where scream 
came"By all Hawks.... what's that??????"he opened the CR and and 
watch inside once CR's opened "Azure are you all right??????"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Inside the CR, AzureBlade started to feel his spark tingle with 
pain, 
> almost as if an energon centipede was crawling on it. The pain 
build 
> up, then, seconds after, a searing shock of energy jolted through 
> him, making him scream loudly in the base.
> 
> AzureBlade: AAAAAAAAAAARRRRRRRGGGHH!!!! STOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOPPPPP! 
STOP 
> IT! AAAAARRRRRRGGGGGHHHH!!!!!! GET ME OUT!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: forget my post if this is a sort of moding.
> > 
> > Predacon prgram detect the Cr's attemp to remove it. It realease 
a 
> > discharge to Azure's spark as warning
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > What was taking him? AzureBlade seemed less patient and 
tolerant 
> > than 
> > > he ever was, but somehow, there was something deeper to it 
than 
> > low 
> > > batteries.
> > > 
> > > He entered a CR chamber, and hoped that it would do.
